definition: East Indian spiny tree having twice-pinnate leaves and yellow flowers followed by flat pods
details:
noun
- East Indian spiny tree having twice-pinnate leaves and yellow flowers followed by flat pods
= example: East Indian spiny tree having twice-pinnate leaves and yellow flowers followed by flat pods
- extract of the heartwood of Acacia catechu used for dyeing and tanning and preserving fishnets and sails
= synonyms: black catechu
